runSchedule.description: Schedule for running the campaign group.

start.description: The start date and time of the campaign group run schedule.

end.description: The end date and time of the campaign group run schedule.

created.description: The date and time when the campaign group was created.

lastModified.description: The date and time when the campaign group was last modified.

test.description: Indicates if the campaign group is a test campaign.

totalBudget.description: Total budget allocated for the campaign group.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the total budget.

servingStatuses.description: List of serving statuses for the campaign group.

backfilled.description: Indicates if the campaign group was backfilled.

id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign group.

account.description: The account associated with the campaign group.

status.description: Current status of the campaign group.

allowedCampaignTypes.description: List of campaign types allowed for this campaign group.
